summary: Diff implements exact-number clip lookup via IndexedDB keyed by full number and updates announcement sequencing to ensure digit steps use TTS and only the final full-number step is recording-eligible. However, the requested “Host Voice Recordings” manager dialog UI (grid/controls/badge/refresh-on-open) is not evidenced in the provided diff summary. Several unrelated Tambola UI/AutoDraw/theme changes appear that were not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Keep (or recreate if missing) a “Host Voice Recordings” manager UI matching the screenshot: dialog titled “Host Voice Recordings” with instructions, scrollable 1–90 grid, per-number record/stop controls, and per-number play/delete controls when recording exists, recorded count badge, and Close button; opening refreshes list from storage.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows changes to voice announcement logic and an IndexedDB clip store, but does not show any dialog/UI component implementation for managing recordings (no evidence of a dialog, grid UI, record/stop/play/delete controls, recorded-count footer, or refresh-on-open behavior).

hallucinated_features.description: Auto Draw pause/resume support and related state/persistence changes (paused flag, interval enforcement, quickReset/newGame behavior changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest (which focuses on voice recordings playback collisions and recordings manager UI).

hallucinated_features.description: UI/layout changes to Tambola components (LastNumberDisplay, NumberBoard, HistoryPanel, GameControls, App section ordering, NewGameControl flow).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by BuildRequest; no requirements mention redesigning Tambola layout or controls beyond the Host Voice Recordings manager UI.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (frontend/src/features/tambola/components/LastNumberDisplay.tsx, NumberBoard.tsx, HistoryPanel.tsx, GameControls.tsx, NewGameControl.tsx, frontend/src/App.tsx)

hallucinated_features.description: Global styling/theme changes (warm amber/orange palette, background pattern, safe-area padding, tailwind config updates, viewport-fit meta).
Voice settings changed to be session-only and clearing any existing localStorage voice settings.
